cyclone.name: FRED
cyclone.current_location: about 75 miles WNW of Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: Continuing west-northwest across Hispaniola, near Turks & Caicos and the southeastern Bahamas Thursday, then near or north of the north-central coast of Cuba and into the eastern Gulf of Mexico, aiming toward the northern Gulf Coast early next week.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: northern Gulf Coast (likely Florida Panhandle / Alabama coast)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Haiti, Turks & Caicos, southeastern Bahamas, portions of Cuba under Tropical Storm Watch
weather_observation.warning_coast: Dominican Republic south coast from Punta Palenque eastward and north coast east of the Haitiâ€“Dominican Republic border under Tropical Storm Warning
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Hispaniola, Turks & Caicos, southeastern Bahamas, north-central Cuba, Florida Keys, southern Florida Peninsula, northern Gulf Coast
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-cyclone-related winds expected at Boston, MA.
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall expected for Boston, MA from Fred.
